amendatorysection.para: Any city specified in section 14-1201 desiring to exercise the power as granted in section 14-1202 to jointly purchase by bargain and sale any existing bridge may do so either when the electors have authorized such joint purchase or have authorized any independent purchase of such bridge. The governing body of the city is authorized to enter into joint contract with the other political unit as to all the conditions of purchase and the conditions of subsequent reconditioning, operation, toll charges, repair, maintenance, renewal, replacement, enlargement and extension of such bridge. Title to the bridge shall vest in the political units cooperating as tenants in common and operation shall be by the joint commission provided for in section 14-1244 and subject to the conditions provided with reference to such commission.
